text: iew: Li-Fraumeni Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Li-Fraumeni syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Li-Fraumeni syndrome 1  - Genetic Testing Registry: Li-Fraumeni syndrome 2  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Cancer  - National Cancer Institute: Genetic Testing for Hereditary Cancer Syndromes   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling
